title: Grand Millennium Dubai offers a half price promotion on health club membership
text:
(MENAFN Press) The Grand Millennium Dubai has launched a special summer offer to help you continue your physical fitness routine despite the heat of the summer. The five-star hotel, known in Dubai for its luxurious spa and wet facilities of high standards meeting all guests' expectations, offers 50% discount on all types of membership at the Jasmine Spa Health Club.

Avail this membership offer, valid until August 31, 2015, to enjoy unrivalled facilities offered by the state-of-the-art gymnasium with temperature controlled outdoor swimming pool and Jacuzzi, Indoor Jacuzzi, Steam, Sauna and Ice fountain. The Health Club facilities also include free access to separate male and female locker rooms, use of towels and access to the relaxation area.

Mr. Peter Mansourian, General Manager of Grand Millennium Dubai said,"Our membership offer gives you the opportunity to continue exercising in a pleasant atmosphere. Also, the gymnasium will remain open from 6am to 11pm daily, giving you the flexibility to work out as per your schedule." 

About Grand Millennium Dubai 
Located just off the Sheikh Zayed Road, the Grand Millennium is conveniently accessible from the Mall of the Emirates and the Ibn Battuta Mall, as well as within easy reach of the city's prime business and leisure attraction including the beach and golf courses. The 340-room five star hotel features a range of award-winning restaurants and bars, a beautiful rooftop pool, superb spa and health club with nine-treatment rooms, state-of-the-art meeting rooms, a magnificent ballroom and exceptional banquet facilities. For guests to stay connected on the road, the hotel provides the convenience of WiFi service in all its luxury cars.For more information about the hotel please visit http://www.grandmillenniumdubai.com
